text:
@DineshDSouza @realDonaldTrump The problem is with the CDC guidelines for coding COVID-19 deaths.  If the cause of death is unknown, or not 100% certain, if they have COVID-19 in addition to other underlying conditions, they will get coded as a COVID-19 death.  

Can you say skewed to cause misleading numbers?
